title: Just one of the boys
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Ted Haley and Mike Mahoney
brief_description: A profile of Eric Davidson, who has been totally blind since the age of two, a victim of the 1917 Halifax explosion. Despite his blindness, Mr. Davidson has spent the past twenty years as a full-time automotive mechanic for the city of Halifax. He is actively involved in the restoration and rebuilding of antique cars and is a well known member of the Antique Car Club.
